website_summaries.verdict: A top pick for a travel sling, this men's bag is high-quality, attractive, and functional.
pros: Features locking mechanisms and a helpful RFID sleeve that men appreciate
It gets top marks for being durable but looking sleek
Users say its a well-made bag for everyday and travel
cons: Some felt the zippers on this model were difficult to close

customer_reviews.title: When I got it it looked like a powder green I should have gone with the ...
customer_reviews.text: The color looks darker in the pictures. The pictures on amazon looks dark green. When I got it it looked like a powder green. I should have gone with the black color Other than that it was great. Nice compartments, fit my tablet, security clips are amazing. I added a video so you guys can see 1st hand.
customer_reviews.author: Romario

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, useful, and secure bag for travel
customer_reviews.text: Travelled through Europe with this. Great bag that a man or woman could wear. Loved the locking zippers and built-in RFID protection. Frequently carried: iPad mini, iPad full size, small jacket, and sundries like pens and hand cream. The only real downside: it's not ambidextrous. The strap hangs on one side and does not swap to the other. So if your shoulder gets tired, too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Silas

customer_reviews.title: Thwarted pickpockets in Paris!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. Just the right size. Held three of our wallets and personal stuff plus an umbrella. We three were walking through a subway tunnel separated by ten feet or so and the bag wearer was in the front. The two of us behind viewed two gypsy looking people walk quickly up behind our leader and reach out towards the bag, but all of a sudden they stopped and moved away. I am SURE once they got close enough they could tell ours was a package and didn't even try. We felt very safe with it and it IS secure if you use the lock closures. Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: tough and secure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for business travel. It's a great organizer for carryon and the cross-body design is super secure in busy places. It's roomy enough to take all the things I want access to in flight. The quality of construction of all PacSafe items is incredible. They have thought of every possible way to keep your possessions secure. It's also extremely tough, so I'm sure it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: S. PembleTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel size
customer_reviews.text: The compact size of this pack is just right for carrying miscellaneous things like pairs of glasses, keys, a small tablet, documents, chargers, and a medium sized water bottle. The sling strap allows it to be easily moved from your back to the front for quick access. In a two week vacation trip, three people stopped me on the street to ask where I got the pack and what brand it was.The slash-proof strap and RFID-blocking document pockets make it a solid choice for travel. This model is the smaller of the two sizes available.
customer_reviews.author: DJ400

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate confidence and security
customer_reviews.text: Just a fantastic little bag. Biggest disappointment is that it is not readily available in the UK. So glad I persisted in getting it. It has more than enough space. I carry my iPad Mini 4, folding keyboard, loves robe notebook and pen, glasses, Bible, portable charger, 3 charging cables, charging plug, pens, pencils, ruler, bank cards (in the RFID pocket), latest book I’m reading, postage stamps, and there is still room for more. This bag is so safe too. The RFID pocket is a great safety feature as are the other locks, exomesh, and secure strap. Non-bulky, non-flashy functional/practical, comfy to carry bag. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mr John W Shades

customer_reviews.title: Great durable, quality product with great pockets for space ...
customer_reviews.text: Great durable, quality product with great pockets for space management. Only thing I would fix is to have another clip on the bottom right. This way, you can choose which way to wear the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Bad Zippers: Does Not Glide
customer_reviews.text: The zippers are hard to use, especially the smaller pocket on the bag. They don't glide well and I spend more time struggling to open/close the bag. Forget about using the security locks: the smaller zipped pocket was impossible to secure. I have a Travelon cross-body bag with better zippers and easier security locks than this sling. It also withstood an overseas trip (pre-pandemic). The only two positive features of this sling are: 1. It can be worn by lefties because you can change the strap direction by the bottom clip. 2. The strap is fairly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Juniper

customer_reviews.title: Sleek bag that can fit a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! I have been searching for a small cross body backpack for traveling to Europe. It’s subtle and sleek! This backpack can fit a 32 oz Nalgene bottle, book, sunglasses, cell phone, wallet, passport and still has room and is not bulky. I love how slim the backpack stays even with filling it full of stuff. The straps are thick and comfortable but there is no extra pocket on the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little pack
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for a trip to Italy after reading some "horror stories" about pickpockets/card scanners/etc. I was highly impressed with this item. We used it for 2 weeks traveling throughout Italy. I have no complaints at all. It was the perfect size and comfortable to wear. My wife preferred it on her back, and I preferred wearing it somewhat backwards/the bag on my chest. Either way, it was nice to have and worked perfect for everything we needed. It has a lot of pockets to store and secure your items in. I would highly recommend this item... especially if you are paranoid about traveling overseas.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Sort of small BUT high quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my muscular large husband. Its a bit tight on him. More befitting me I would think. BUT we made it work even tho I had to continue to unsnarl the straps. I would say OK and if not needing a full size backpack it works for jaunts around the city while on travel.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Tigh

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: It fits your iPad (except a 12,9 inch one) and still has extra room for everything. I can even fit a light jacket and an Umbrella for rainy days. The extra anti theft features are great for traveling or just regular commuting in pick pocket infested places. Materials seems pretty durable so far and is confortable and lightweight. As long as you don't have to bring unfolded papers or something large this bag does the work amazingly well.
customer_reviews.author: rahvii

customer_reviews.title: Great for an 11” iPad
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! I already had the Metrosafe 25L backpack, so I knew what to expect in terms of quality. I am very fond of the side-effect of the security mesh in the fabric, as it makes the bags hold there shape better than any other bag I have had without a frame. I carry my iPad Pro 11” in the main padded pocket with my Nintendo Switch and attached joycons in a small case also in the main compartment. In the padded pocket in the front flap compartment holds my Kindle, cards, pen, sharpie, pill tube, usb hub, and this pocket is deeper than you would expect.
customer_reviews.author: JDP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent safety travel bag/pouch for everything
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag easy to sling on and with secure pockets and zips, I managed to it a pocket jacket, a towel, slim bottle water, wallets, passports, cash. Everything fit nicely and i did not have to check my bag in at the Acropolis museum. Love the bag a ton. Thank you for a well design, long lasting travel pouch.
customer_reviews.author: sendy cay

customer_reviews.title: Not correct model sent
customer_reviews.text: High quality product in materials & construction! But I did not receive the exact one as pictured. Mine had the R front pocket security clip way down deep in R front corner, making it harder to fasten zipper pulls, not on the side as in photo. I also wondered how long the big pocket plastic security clip would last (really Pacsafe?). Annoyingly, I was charged $7.52 for returning it, & I'm a Prime member!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Vance

customer_reviews.title: This bag saved use from someone steal from us!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after my friend raved about it. Someone tried to cut it with a razor during a trip to Europe and it wasn’t damaged. This was definitely worth not losing valuables for the $.
customer_reviews.author: Travis S.

customer_reviews.title: The pack is ok with great places to store things like passport and walled
customer_reviews.text: Used in Italy. The pack is ok with great places to store things like passport and walled. But, I found it uncomfortable when draped across the front of my body.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Z.

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat a pacsafe bag
customer_reviews.text: I got two one for me and another for my son as we travel we can carry esaentials and ao much safety and quality in this product

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. I'm a dog walker so I have to access my keys and phone all the time. It's ergonomically fitted to my back and also easy access to what I need.
customer_reviews.author: C Lai

customer_reviews.title: Almost Bullet Proof
customer_reviews.text: This bag holds all you need to walk around for the day in style. Solid build, all but bullet proof.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dow

customer_reviews.title: Compact backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size backpack for an older person to tote around while sightseeing. It has a shoulder sling so you can bring it to the front without taking it off. If you just have a few items like documents , a camera, water bottle, passports and a small umbrella, it's all you need. And also the zipper tabs are lockable.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbert J. Harrington Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Not to big, perfect size for day trips, holds camera, water bottle, can fit quite a bit in it. Used it everyday when traveling in Italy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy j

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wear and locks well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Disney because I could lock my wallet and put my water bottle in the larger department. I had previously purchased a cheaper one but returned it because it wasn’t made well. I love this one. It was perfect
customer_reviews.author: J. Browning

customer_reviews.title: and has nice compartments to organize your things
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, compact, and has nice compartments to organize your things, though I do wish it had a bigger main compartment. The anti-theft design is great.

customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit 11”iPad in tablet pocket easily with a case, a bit too tight.

customer_reviews.title: pocket

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling, which is what I had wanted it for. Plenty of room and compartments inside, but would love for it to be a little darker color.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag

customer_reviews.text: My only concern is that this bag can only be used on the right shoulder. Strap cannot be switched to the other side.

customer_reviews.title: Great travel companion
customer_reviews.text: It was a great travel purse. I like that I could maneuver it so that it was over my belly and safe from pick pockets.

customer_reviews.text: I used this during my first time to Europe last year and this product performed well.

customer_reviews.text: traveled all over Switzerland with this! Perfect! Good quality! Could be slightly larger to hold a camera better, but it worked and it will be my travel bag again!

customer_reviews.text: It bit bulky but fit all that I needed to bring to Isla Mujeres with a peace of mind.

customer_reviews.text: very convenient and light weight and safely. I like it very much

customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag, it's my EDC. A bit on the small side though, would have been great if they'd made it just a bit larger, and about an inch deeper.

customer_reviews.title: Not as Pictured!
customer_reviews.text: This item is not as pictured! It only fits properly (as shown) with pack upright and closely fitted to back if strap is placed across left shoulder. Design might have been ambidextrous if they’d also included another shoulder-strap lower attachment point opposite where the (only) one is now.

customer_reviews.title: Nice  👍👍👍

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The size and workmanship meets my needs. One problem is that the shoulder strap connects to a ring at one bottom corner. There is not a ring on the other side. It would be better if one had a choice which side the strap is suspended from. I modified the bag by adding two hog rings into the fabric at the opposite corner.

Convenient pockets and easily accessible unless I lock it down. Keep it hung in front of me and is comfortable on my shoulder.

customer_reviews.text: Just the right fit for my European trip. I can wear it in front & get to everything. It's perfect!

customer_reviews.text: Used this for a recent trip to Rome. Was the perfect size. It takes a little getting used to getting in and out of but that's the trade off for security. Worked great, kept everything safe.

customer_reviews.text: This is a nice man bag. I haven't yet encountered anew any knife wielding Roma (G'sies) or other new arrivals in Europe but I'd expect the embedded shielding to resist the usual attacks.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect anti-theft day pack.
customer_reviews.text: Going to Egypt soon and bought this for my husband to use during the day as a day bag. Smaller than a back pack but perfect for sun screen, bottle of water, guide book, etc. Perfect anti-theft bag. The cross body is much more comfortable than a back pack. One he had someone cut half way through strap on back pack but this can't be cut. We believe in the Anti-Theft products.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but...dimensions.
customer_reviews.text: Will not fist a Samsung Tablet 12.2 tablet without case or keyboard. The bag is smaler due to how it's shaped; the usuable space is curved, so square items may not quite fit. Otherwise it looks great, seems robust. I just bought the Travelon Classic Plus Sling (cheaper), so hopefully that will just fit my needs by either primarily transporting the tablet or Dell XPS 13. This bag is just too pricey to justify keeping otherwise I would have and I can see how this would be practical for a 9" tablet, kindle, some running around stuff (wallet, notebook etc, travel guide maybe?).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L.

product_meta.title: Pacsafe Metrosafe LS150 7 Liter Anti Theft Sling Backpack - Fits 7 inch Tablet with RFID Blocking Pocket and Lockable Zippers for Women & Men (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

The revamped Metrosafe LS150 anti-theft sling backpack from Pacsafe stays true to its classic design heritage, while providing functionality and seamlessly integrated security technology.

The bag’s fabric is embedded with eXomesh Slashguard, a lightweight flexible, stainless steel wire mesh that protects your gear from a quick slash-and-run theft. Flexible, stainless steel wire runs through the adjustable Carrysafe Slashguard cross-body strap to help prevent slashers from slicing through and running off with your gear, while the Turn & Lock Security Hook attaches the bag to a fixture for added security. The Lockabout Security Clip and smart zipper security provide multiple layers of protection and lockdown points for zippers to help protect against pickpockets.

The RFIDsafe blocking pocket helps prevent your data (such as from e-passports, credit cards, and key cards) from falling into the wrong hands. Additional Metrosafe LS150 features include zippered main and front pockets with organization for cards, phone and passport, an iPad compatible sleeve, and adjustable cross-body strap. It holds a volume of 7-liters and weighs just one pound.

Pacsafe keeps travelers one step ahead of the game by keeping their gear secure from opportunistic thieves with a wide range of stylish adventure backpacks, leisure bags, urban bags, women’s bags, and camera bags, as well as luggage and travel accessories.
feature_bullets: ANTI-THEFT DESIGN - with Lockable Zippers and Cut Proof Materials (lightweight steel mesh) to prevent theft/ pickpocketing, plus an RFID blocking pocket to keep your credit cards/ IDs safe. Patented in the USA, by Pacsafe, the original anti-theft brand.

ORGANIZATION & POCKETS - 2* Lockable Zipper Compartments, 2* Padded Sleeves (one Fits 7" Tablet), 2* Zipper Interior Pockets (1* RFIDsafe), 1* Key / Wallet Clip. Main compartment ideal for money, keys, phone and tablet. Front one with two slots for pens.

RFID SAFE - Zipper pocket with RFID blocking material meets official US FIPS 201 quality standard for extra security to protect your credits cards/ IDs against unauthorized scans when traveling overseas to crowded tourist hotspots.

MAXIMUM SECURITY & FAST ACCESS - The main compartment can be properly locked (optionally also with a padlock, which is not included). The front pocket's zippers are secured with a clip for fast and easy access, while still offering enhanced protection.

DIMENSIONS, WEIGHT & MATERIAL - 12.6"H x 7.9"W x 2.8"D. Weight: 1.18 lbs. Made of durable, water resistant and easy to clean nylon. With comfortable, padded strap. Ideal for vacations, business trips, or as a carry-on. Comes with a 5-year Pacsafe warranty.
Pockets: 3 interior slip, 2 interior zip, 1 exterior

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars177 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
